Text: If you don't want or need to download the whole 'Word of Promise' start here with the Book of Acts. Stacy Keach does the voice of Saul/Paul.

Hey John... sorry... my internet keeps cutting in and out... and it's only about half a meg speed... I'm upgrading to 6 or 12 meg in the next 10 days.  Johnny Cash Reads The New Testament will be downloading faster for you then.  :)
